docs.snippet: The eighth Pan-American conference took its first conclusive action today, unanimously adopting a resolution intended to commit the Americas to liberal trade practices in their dealings among themselves and with the rest of the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: The eighth Pan-American conference took its first conclusive action today, unanimously adopting a resolution intended to commit the Americas to liberal trade practices in their dealings among themselves and with the rest of the world.
docs.abstract: principles embodied in adopted trade resolution

headline.main: HULL TRADE POLICY IS ADOPTED AT LIMA FOR ALL AMERICAS; Signatories Pledge End of Restrictions on Commerce Other Than by Tariffs ALIEN INTERESTS ISSUE UP Mexico Urges Limitation on Protection of Nationals in Business in Other Lands Hull's Principles Embodied Program Is World-Wide HULL TRADE POLICY IS ADOPTED AT LIMA TEXT OF TRADE RESOLUTION Solidarity Action Expected

docs.snippet: A report recently published abroad that Brazil was negotiating a new barter agreement with Germany was emphatically denied today by Foreign Minister Oswaldo Aranha.
docs.lead_paragraph: A report recently published abroad that Brazil was negotiating a new barter agreement with Germany was emphatically denied today by Foreign Minister Oswaldo Aranha.

headline.main: NEW GERMAN PACT FOR BRAZIL LIKELY; Cotton Interests Are Pressing for It, Though Aranha Denies Barter Negotiations CHANGED SYSTEM IS SEEN It Is Believed U. S. Has Urged Rio de Janeiro to Bufy No More Than Reich Does U. S. Suggestion Seen Uruguay and Italy in Pact

docs.snippet: The interest of the delegates to the Eighth Pan-American Conference was concentrated today in a new project circulated by the American delegation for a declaration on continental solidarity to be known as The Declaration of Lima.
docs.lead_paragraph: The interest of the delegates to the Eighth Pan-American Conference was concentrated today in a new project circulated by the American delegation for a declaration on continental solidarity to be known as The Declaration of Lima.
docs.abstract: U S delegates propose solidarity declaration; conciliation attempts

docs.snippet: This is no place for Cordell Hull. That arch-foe of bilateralism in trade between nations is much better off just now at Lima, with the breadth of a whole continent between him and Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: This is no place for Cordell Hull. That arch-foe of bilateralism in trade between nations is much better off just now at Lima, with the breadth of a whole continent between him and Uruguay.

headline.main: U. S. Trade in Uruguay Declines; She Buys Only Where She Sells; Officials Urge Us to Remedy the Situation by Stabilizing Our Trade -Policy of Bilateral Pacts Followed by Government Americans Urged to Buy No Resentment Shown European Nations Gain Trade Europeans Act Differently

docs.snippet: With only six working days left the eighth Pan-American Conference was confronted today with the task of taking action on nearly 150 projects 'during the coming week in addition to working out a compromise between the divergent viewpoints of...
docs.lead_paragraph: With only six working days left the eighth Pan-American Conference was confronted today with the task of taking action on nearly 150 projects 'during the coming week in addition to working out a compromise between the divergent viewpoints of Argentina and the-United States on the keynote problem of continental solidarity.

headline.main: LIMA PARLEY FACED WITH 150 PROJECTS; Only Six Working Days Left to Conference for Completion of Program for Americas U. S.-ARGENTINA AT ODDS Compromise Sought Between Divergent Points of View on Continental Solidarity Discussion Reported Friendly Machinery is Set Up
